## format() function

Returns a nice formatted string for a number

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function format(value: number, options?: {
    minExp?: number;
    precision?: number;
}): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number |  |
|  options | { minExp?: number; precision?: number; } | <i>(Optional)</i> |
